alert.note: Alert for Perry (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued December 18 at 3:57PM CST until December 20 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Tennessee... Buffalo River Near Lobelville affecting Perry County. For the Buffalo River...including Lobelville...elevated river levels are forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Sunday afternoon at 300 PM CST. && ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Buffalo River Near Lobelville. * WHEN...From this afternoon to early Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Portions of secondary roads near Old Highway 13 are inundated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:30 PM CST Saturday the stage was 11.0 feet and rising. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest near 12.0 feet tomorrow morning. - Action stage is 10.0 feet. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
